messages.title: The SNP/Lib Dem record of failure
messages.content: Cut grants to galas and festivals, cut hanging baskets and floral displays, cut funding to community councils and local organisations, introducing charges for blue disabled badges, cut home help services, cut home to school transport, cut school budgets, closing local registration offices.

messages.title: Labour Delivers
messages.content: National Minimum Wage, Working & Child Tax Credits, 8000 Apprenticeships, Winter Fuel Payment, Free bus travel for pensioners, Improved maternity and paternity rights, Free personal care for the elderly.

messages.title: We can't afford to go back to another Tory Government

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's delivery includes National Minimum Wage
Labour's delivery includes Working & Child Tax Credits
Labour's delivery includes Winter Fuel Payment
Labour's delivery includes free bus travel for pensioners
Labour's delivery includes improved maternity and paternity rights
Labour's delivery includes Free personal care for the elderly

leaflet.personalStatement: A Fresh, New Voice for East Lothian

images.caption: Fiona O'Donnell with a Labour rose logo, indicating her party affiliation to Labour.
